title: Resource Culler
description: Automatic culling of idle kernels, terminals, and workspaces

terminalCullDisconnectedOnly.title: Only Cull Disconnected Terminals
terminalCullDisconnectedOnly.description: When enabled, only cull terminals with no active browser tab. Terminals with open tabs are kept even if idle.

workspaceCullEnabled.title: Enable Workspace Culling
workspaceCullEnabled.description: Cull unused JupyterLab workspaces (auto-0, auto-k, etc.). The default workspace is never culled.

workspaceCullIdleTimeout.title: Workspace Idle Timeout (minutes)
workspaceCullIdleTimeout.description: Default: 7 days (10080 minutes). Based on last_modified timestamp.

showNotifications.title: Show Notifications
showNotifications.description: Display summary notification when resources are culled
